title: Kind of futuristic font
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417033426im_/http:/typophile.com/files/shirt%20front_3851.jpg)

I'm trying to identify the font on this t-shirt. I've tried several methods of font identification and none can give me objective results. It appears to be similar to the OCR fonts, but it's not quite it.

I'm not talking about the Sword Art Online logo.

I'd be very helpful if someone could identify it for me.

Thank you in advance.

Font: 

 Dylovastuff 

Solved By: 

 [bojev](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417033426/http:/typophile.com/user/7409 "View user profile.")
author: RobSp1derp1g
